document.full_text: the reported use of "geronimo" as a codeword in the operation that led to osama bin laden's killing has angered some native americans and threatens to become an embarrassment for the obama administration.
document.title: bin laden, geronimo link angers native americans
lines_and_colors: the reported use of "geronimo" as a codeword in the operation that led to osama bin laden's killing has angered some native americans and threatens to become an embarrassment for the obama administration.
